title: Misael Escuti
text: Misael Escuti Rovira (20 December 1926 – 3 January 2005) was a Chilean <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er of Italian ancestry, remembered for being the key player with the <a href="Chile%20national%20football%20team">Chilean national team</a> that reached third place in the <a href="1962%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1962 FIFA World Cup</a> tournament.
